review: I love the Fire stick.  It is so nice to watch movies on my big tv.  One of the best investments I've made.
author: Amazon Customer

review: As long as you have the Amazon Prime membership ($99 a year) and wifi this thing is AWESOME! I just wasn't so sure from the description of how it worked that I was going to be happy when I ordered it. But it's a very cool entertainment source that I still haven't figured everything out on yet (and not because it's complicated, I just haven't had time to figure out the music stuff yet). And the app for my Kindle Fire works with it really cool!!! Super happy with it!!
author: Charlene

review: Love it! It does everything you could ever need from a streaming device.
author: jake rick

review: Had the fire tv stick for about two months and love it.
author: Augustus Kelly

review: Easy to install and made me glad I cancelled  my overpriced cable!
author: Audi Oehler

review: It would be nice to get more shows without having yo pay more money. Why isn't it compatible with Comcast?
author: Anne-Marie Baxter

review: Smooth and easy to use. Happy with the purchase.
author: Idris Adjerid

review: Awesome, easy to navigate and set up.
author: todd

review: Works well - opens up my viewing choices.
author: ann sokoloff

review: The Fire Stick works great! It was easy to set up and having an app for it is also quite handy!
author: beckyk2594
